User.Title: Mr.
User.DescriptionKey: Yet another currency technology office user.

UserGroup.DescriptionKey: Configurator Group - This group will be assigned to users having access to the Configurator Plug-in

Permission.DescriptionKey: Permission to run the AdaptationTool plug-in.
Permission to run the AdaptationTool plug-in in developer mode.
Permission to run the AdaptationTool plug-in in standard mode.
Permission to run the AdaptationTool plug-in in service mode.
Permission to run the Software Analyzer plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center Adjustment plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center BPS Gateway Administration plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center Configurator plug-in.
General Permission to Create/Modify/Delete Configurator Objects.
Permission to Create/Modify/Delete Reporting Section/Trigger Types.
Permission to Create/Modify/Delete Report Assemblies.
Permission to Create/Modify/Delete Machine Properties.
Permission to run the Control Center Banknote Analyzer plug-in.
Permission to set the machine's banknote data storing mode in the Control Center Banknote Analyzer plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center GSL Designer plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center Production plug-in.
Permission to do live monitoring in the Control Center Production plug-in.
Permission to do manual reports in the Control Center Production plug-in.
Permission to do manual storage maintenance in the Control Center Production plug-in.
Permission to edit downtime / idletime records in the Control Center Production plug-in.
Permission to run the SenOpModeConfigurator plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to delete database data using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to view database tables using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to edit rows of database tables using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to use the object view within the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to run SQL statements using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to import data into the database using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to export database data using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to create database scripts using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to import configuration data into the database using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to edit configuration data in the database using the Control Center Storage Management plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission that gives access to deploy (via BPS Gateway hierarchies) enterprise definitions (like permission, user group and rules) in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission that gives access to export enterprise definitions (like permission, user group and rules) in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission that gives access to import enterprise definitions (like permission, user group and rules) in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission that gives access to the security event log in the Control Security Center plug-in.
Permission to do user group management in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to do user management in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to do rules management in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to lock and unlock users in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to reset a user's password or force a password change in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to force an undo checkout of the account repository (checked out by another user for instance) in the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to have access to the 'Force password change on next logon' setting in the user definition of the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to have access to the 'User cannot change password' setting in the user definition of the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to have access to the 'Password never expires' setting in the user definition of the Control Center Security plug-in.
Permission to run the Control Center Operation Settings plug-in.
Permission to edit and deploy machine configurations.
Permission to override and deploy machine configurations for testing.
Permission to Import and Activate/De-activate CTO deployed configurations.
Permission to run the Control Center Trace Analyzer plug-in.
Permission that gives access to certain machine functions (grouped into class 1) that are grouped for ease of use (configurable in the Control Center Configurator plug-in).
Permission that gives access to certain machine functions (grouped into class 2) that are grouped for ease of use (configurable in the Control Center Configurator plug-in).
Permission that gives access to certain machine functions (grouped into class 3) that are grouped for ease of use (configurable in the Control Center Configurator plug-in).
Permission that gives access to certain machine functions (grouped into class 4) that are grouped for ease of use (configurable in the Control Center Configurator plug-in).
Permission that gives access to certain machine functions (grouped into class 5) that are grouped for ease of use (configurable in the Control Center Configurator plug-in).

Permission to recover from a component failure.
Permission to confirm the battery low system event.

Permission to end downtime recording.
